item.title: Video Editor for my podcast - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description: Video Editor for Strategic Moves Podcast
Are you a creative video editor with a passion for storytelling? Join our team at Strategic Moves Podcast! We produce engaging, hour-long episodes featuring insightful conversations with diverse guests. Airing four times a month, our podcast explores the intersections of art, culture, politics, and business.

Responsibilities:

Edit 45-minute to 1-hour podcast episodes for YouTube and other platforms.
Enhance audio quality and incorporate visuals, graphics, and music.
Ensure timely delivery of episodes to maintain our monthly schedule.
Qualifications:

Proficient in video editing software (Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, etc.).
Strong sense of pacing, storytelling, and visual aesthetics.
Experience in audio enhancement and synchronization.
Join us and contribute to meaningful conversations that inspire and inform our audience!

Check out our channel: Strategic Moves Podcast on YouTube

Hourly Range: $36.00-$60.00
Posted On: July 01, 2024 17:08 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Intro & Outro, Digital Video, Corporate Video, Spokesperson Video, YouTube Video, Audio Editing, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Podcast
Skills: Video Intro & Outro, Digital Video, Corporate Video, Spokesperson Video, YouTube Video, Audio Editing, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Podcast
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: We need high quality content creators to help promote our products so we can use on our social media - Upwork
item.description:
We don't need a graphic designer or a video editor.

We need content creators to record content creatively and strategically of our products so we can use those videos for our TikTok and Instagram Posts.

You MUST have a content creator portfolio and share your rates per video. You would get products from us, record content strategically, and edit the videos, then give us all the rights to them so we can use for ads and social media posts.

We are urgent hiring so please send your portfolio and rates.

Thanks :)


Posted On: July 01, 2024 16:50 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Social Media Content Creation
Skills: Social Media Content Creation
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
